com.dua3.meja.model

Class Font.FontDef

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.dua3.meja.model.Font.FontDef
  • Enclosing interface:
    Font

    public static class Font.FontDef
extends java.lang.Object
    A mutable class holding font attributes to help creating immutable font instances.
